item.title: Work with the garage door up
item.description: _index | digital-garden Ideas that help me justify learning in public. [[Living beyond your expiration date]]/ [[What legacy would I like to leave?]] Force multiplier in conceptualizing. [[Create more value than you capture]] Writing is a powerful tool, writing for the public is even more powerful. [[21-07-29_Th]]: Writing as a thinking tool. [[Show Your Work]] - [[Austin Kleon]] I read a little too much to not retain anything from my time.
